spells.name: Aspect of the Wolf
spells.description: Subject gains +4 Str and Dex, and +2 bonus on trip attacks.

spells.name: Blessing of the Salamander
spells.description: Subject gets fast healing 5, fire resistance 20, +2 CMD.

spells.name: Bow Spirit
spells.description: Summons an invisible spirit that fires your arrows for you as a swift action.

spells.name: Grove of Respite
spells.description: Creates trees and a small spring.
